name: Alien Lock-In
description:
The game is not only chaotic by having you try to fight a horde of annoying aliens, but also because some of the aliens WILL mess with your keys and mouse! 

Beware of those, survive as many rounds as you can and don't forget to have fun!

  • Use WASD keys to move
  • left mouse button to shoot
  • R to reload
  • Shoot twice to kill special aliens
  • Drag stolen WASD keys back into place
  • If you have missing WASD keys you can do micro-managing as you see fit!
